reviews.text: Our stay in Longueville Manor was exquisite! The surrounding countryside is spectacular, the lovely old farmyard, apple orchards, gardens..all a live farm, were a real treat, especially to our young son who absolutely loved our ramble through the grounds, accompanied by their pet dog.
reviews.title: Exceptional Old Country Mansion

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff couldn't have been nicer, rooms were luxurious, food was exceptional and the whole feel was of a "special getaway" as you felt like a member of the old gentry almost!
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise

reviews.text: Only thing I'll say is that it is pricey enough for dinner B&B, but when you imagine what the upkeep must cost and the service provided, you do feel it's worth it.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Left feeling relaxed and very well looked after.
reviews.title: Memories are made of this!
